title: Microwave, Spacious Walk-In Closet, Short Term Lease
posting_body: ['Get ready to be inspired and prepare everyday meals in our kitchens that feature microwaves and have a dishwasher for easy clean up.', 'Apart from our fully-equipped kitchens, our homes also include spacious walk-in closets, washer/dryer sets, built-in computer desks, and a private patio or balcony among other thoughtful additions.', 'Other highlights on our property include a resident clubhouse with conference room and internet caf, fitness center, heated swimming pool with hot tub, and pet wash station.', 'Residents of all ages will find an activity to enjoy, whether it is our nine-hole putting green or our life-size chess or cornhole games.', '-Resident Clubhouse with an Internet Cafe, TV, & Pool Table', '-Additional Storage Space Available', '-Short Term Lease', '-Central Heat', '-Night Patrol', '-Resort-Inspired Year-Round Heated Pool & Spa', '-Pet Friendly Community with Pampered Pet Wash Station and Beautiful Courtyard with Pet Stations', '-Dishwasher', '-Washer/Dryer', '-Microwave', '-Plank-Wood Style Flooring', '-Dog Park', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Contact leasing office for details.']
